org.jpaste.pastebin

Class Pastebin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpaste.pastebin.Pastebin

  • public class Pastebin
extends java.lang.Object
    A global representation of the pastebin site

    Holds various constants and method shortcuts

    Author:
    Brian B

      • pastePaste

        public static java.net.URL pastePaste(java.lang.String developerKey,
                      java.lang.String contents)
                               throws PasteException
        Generates a paste on pastebin and returns the URL to it
        Parameters:
        developerKey - a developer key which can be fetched from the pastebin API page
        contents - contents of the paste
        Returns:
        URL to paste
        Throws:
        PasteException - if it failed to push the paste

                               throws PasteException

      • getTrending

        public static PastebinLink[] getTrending(java.lang.String developerKey)
                                  throws ParseException
        Gets the current trending pastebin pastes
        Parameters:
        developerKey - a developer key which can be fetched from the pastebin API page
        Returns:
        an array of PastebinLink
        Throws:
        ParseException - if it failed to parse the trending pastes
